title: Why is COVID-19 being called a “plandemic”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Conspiracy theorists have spread more than a thousand nonsense claims about Covid-19, which is to be expected. This is to be expected, especially — when the person in the Oval Office is actually fueling many of them, and spreading them himself. There are dozens of such conspiracy theories that claim that Covid-19 was manufactured in a lab (we know for certain, scientifically, that is a lie), or that it was released as some deliberate act by some big pharma corporations, or by Bill Gates, or by George Soros, in order to profit Or, that it was deliberately unleashed upon the planet to sabotage the November election, and ruin it all for that meek, mild, innocent victim Donald Trump (this disease was spread, intentionally, of course, by “those sneaky, nefarious members of the Democratic Party!” Because, “the only good democrat(ic) is a dead democrat(ic)!” Those are all utter bullshit, of course. But, somebody sitting in the Oval Office is promoting them, on a daily basis… Covid -19 is not a “plandemic.” (That is a made-up word). It was not planned. By anyone. — However by definition, Covid-19 is a pandemic. It is called a pandemic by “some people” — because it actually is a pandemic. pandemic [noun]. an outbreak of a disease that occurs over a wide geographic area and affects an exceptionally high proportion of the population : “a pandemic outbreak of a disease.” [-Merriam-Webster.]  Covid-19 cases have been on found on every one of the seven continents on the planet earth — with the exception of the few hundreds of people who are stationed in Antarctica, or who actually “live” in Antarctica. Covid-19 deaths have occurred on every one of the seven continents on the planet earth — with the exception of the few hundreds of people who are stationed in Antarctica, or who actually “live” in Antarctica. Because, by definition, Covid-19 is a pandemic. I hope that helps.
